javafxapplicationud3example.ui.controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafxapplicationud3example.ui.controller.GenericController
      • javafxapplicationud3example.ui.controller.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends GenericController
    Controller UI class for Login view in users' management application. It contains event handlers and initialization code for the view defined in Login.fxml file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.scene.control.Button btAceptar
      Button to fire action to log in at the UI.

      User's password value UI entry field.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField tfUsuario
      User's login name UI text field.

      • initStage

        public void initStage(javafx.scene.Parent root)

        Parameters:

      • handleWindowShowing

        private void handleWindowShowing(javafx.stage.WindowEvent event)
        Window event method handler. It implements behavior for WINDOW_SHOWING type event.
        Parameters:
        event - The window event

      • handleButtonAceptarAction

        private void handleButtonAceptarAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Action event handler for Aceptar button. It validates that user and password fields are filled. If they are not, an error message dialog is shown. Otherwise the users' data managing window is opened.
        Parameters:
        event - The Action event

      • textChanged

        private void textChanged(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue observable,
                         java.lang.String oldValue,
                         java.lang.String newValue)
        Text changed event handler. It validates that user and password fields has any content to enable/disable Aceptar button.
        Parameters:
        observable - The value being observed.
        oldValue - The old value of the observable.
        newValue - The new value of the observable.
